name: Crime Files
description:
Crime Files is the #1 procedural forensics crime scene investigation game that combines challenging puzzles and hidden object game-play. Feel the thrill of putting murderers behind bars now!

Partner up with LCPD and unleash your crime solving skills in this wildly fun puzzle and adventure game. Investigate stunning crime scenes, spot clues, analyze evidence, interrogate suspects and make the arrests! Step into the shoes of a detective and time to find your first clue!

Game Features:
- Reveal the truth behind 5 unique criminal cases
- Customize your avatar with other CSI team members
- It’s not just hidden object games. You’ll have to use all your puzzling skills!
